text: Alaric Bennedict Basson (born 16 February 1996) is a South African swimmer. He competed in the men's 200 metre breaststroke at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships. His twin brother Alard is also a swimmer. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:African Games gold medalists for South Africa Category:African Games medalists in swimming Category:African Games silver medalists for South Africa Category:Coloured South African people Category:Competitors at the 2015 African Games Category:Competitors at the 2019 African Games Category:Male breaststroke swimmers Category:Male freestyle swimmers Category:People from Uitenhage Category:South African male swimmers Category:African Games competitors for South Africa
title: Alaric Basson
